Lvl9.question:
def strManipulate(word1, word2,
        z):
    x = len(word1)
    y = len(word2)
    print((x + y) % z)
strManipulate('!', '~', £)

Lvl10.question:
num = !
sum = 0
temp = num
while temp > 0:
    digit = temp % 10
    sum += digit ** 3
    temp //= 10
if num == sum:
    print(str(num) + ' YES')
else:
    print(str(num) + ' NO')

string = ''
list = [£, $, !, '~']
for i in list:
    string = str(i) + string
print(string)
